body:
Hullo Avicus,

So recently I have been searching all over the Internet for a good default edit texture pack / resource pack, I haven't been doing so well, always finding packs that I don't like or just have a couple things wrong. If anyone could please list some good Default Edit Texture Packs that would be great.

Thanks


Oh, and for the people who can't be bothered to read that all you have to do is
- List a good default texture pack

replies.body: Would you be bothered if it wasn't actually default? I have a sick Red Edit with 16x16 blocks that aren't default. In fact, they're the same blocks as Danteh's purple pack listed above by h0t
